name: Ted Spinks
description: Ted Spinks is a Senior Solutions Architect at Codefresh. He is huge fan of DevOps automation. He loves writing code, diving into new APIs, and solving automation challenges. Before Codefresh, Ted worked as a CI/CD engineer for an autonomous driving software company, Zenuity, and as a consultant at AHEAD and VMware.
